name: PresentX
description:
In PresentX present your ideas and pitch to the audience. Feel out the crowd and win them to your side. At last, someone has turned presentations into a video game!

PresentX is the combination of a rhythm and card game. Build a strategy in way of a deck to compliment your presentation. Play those cards at the right moments to execute your presentation and win over the crowd!

How to Play

Select a level, create a deck or stick with the prebuilt deck and go!

Play your cards, timing them with your moments on your presentation timeline as if it was a rhythm game. Use your cards to fill the moments on the timeline and increase the interest, excitement and knowledge of your audience.

At the end of the level, the audience's interest, excitement and knowledge is matched against the goals of the level to see if you succeeded!

  • Playing a card on a moment will yield you another card. Playing a card while not on a moment will use the card to no effect.
  • Try to fill your moment's requirements as close as possible anything missed will make your audience angry, anything overspent will be used to no effect.
